{{disambig-more: '''Mr. Bliss''' (Мистер Блисс) is a [[2004]] Russian-language adaptation of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s story [[Mr. Bliss
Mr. Bliss: of the same name]], produced by Tolkien Texts Translation. The animated cartoon is 33 minutes in length, and narrated by [[Dmitri Matveyev]]. The film was shown at [[Tolkien Thing]] 2006 and [[Ring*Con 2006]].

{{disambig-more: The film's animation style is heavily based on Tolkien's own drawings of Mr. Bliss that have appeared in various editions of the story.
